messages.content: Hi! I wanted to know, what is a concubine?

A concubine is a woman who is the companion and sexual partner of a man in a relationship that is outside of marriage. They often live with their partner and may have children with them, but they do not have the same rights or social standing as a wife. Concupines have existed in many cultures throughout history and have been seen as a status symbol.
Yes, concubines were often given gifts and money as part of their arrangement with the man.
Can you make a very short summary on out conversation so far?
concubine is a woman who is the companion and sexual partner of a man in a relationship that is outside of marriage, often with gifts and money involved.
